participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, often lost in thought but caring towards others.
participant_1.background: i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, always looking for ways to express himself, enjoys social activities.
participant_2.background: i dance on the weekends. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i don't care about fashion.

content.text: hi, do you believe in god? i do.
i am sorry, i don't. i think god does.
